com.docusign.esign.api

Interface CloudStorageApi


  • public interface CloudStorageApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> createProvider(String accountId, String userId, CloudStorageProviders cloudStorageProviders)
      Configures the redirect URL information for one or more cloud storage providers for the specified user.
      retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> deleteProvider(String accountId, String serviceId, String userId)
      Deletes the user authentication information for the specified cloud storage provider.
      retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> deleteProviders(String accountId, String userId, CloudStorageProviders cloudStorageProviders)
      Deletes the user authentication information for one or more cloud storage providers.
      retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> getProvider(String accountId, String serviceId, String userId, String redirectUrl)
      Gets the specified Cloud Storage Provider configuration for the User.
      retrofit2.Call<ExternalFolder> list(String accountId, String folderId, String serviceId, String userId, String cloudStorageFolderPath, String count, String order, String orderBy, String searchText, String startPosition)
      Gets a list of all the items from the specified cloud storage provider.
      retrofit2.Call<ExternalFolder> listFolders(String accountId, String serviceId, String userId, String cloudStorageFolderPath, String count, String order, String orderBy, String searchText, String startPosition)
      Retrieves a list of all the items in a specified folder from the specified cloud storage provider.
      retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> listProviders(String accountId, String userId, String redirectUrl)
      Get the Cloud Storage Provider configuration for the specified user.

    • Method Detail

      • createProvider

        @POST(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage")
retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> createProvider(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                         String accountId,
                                                                                                                         @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                         String userId,
                                                                                                                         @Body
                                                                                                                         CloudStorageProviders cloudStorageProviders)
        Configures the redirect URL information for one or more cloud storage providers for the specified user. Configures the redirect URL information for one or more cloud storage providers for the specified user. The redirect URL is added to the authentication URL to complete the return route.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        cloudStorageProviders - (optional)
        Returns:
        Call

      • deleteProvider

        @DELETE(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage/{serviceId}")
retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> deleteProvider(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                       String accountId,
                                                                                                                                       @Path(value="serviceId")
                                                                                                                                       String serviceId,
                                                                                                                                       @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                       String userId)
        Deletes the user authentication information for the specified cloud storage provider. Deletes the user authentication information for the specified cloud storage provider. The next time the user tries to access the cloud storage provider, they must pass normal authentication for this cloud storage provider.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        serviceId - The ID of the service to access. \n\nValid values are the service name (\"Box\") or the numerical serviceId (\"4136\"). (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        Returns:
        Call

      • deleteProviders

        @DELETE(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage")
retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> deleteProviders(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                            String accountId,
                                                                                                                            @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                            String userId,
                                                                                                                            @Body
                                                                                                                            CloudStorageProviders cloudStorageProviders)
        Deletes the user authentication information for one or more cloud storage providers. Deletes the user authentication information for one or more cloud storage providers. The next time the user tries to access the cloud storage provider, they must pass normal authentication.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        cloudStorageProviders - (optional)
        Returns:
        Call

      • getProvider

        @GET(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage/{serviceId}")
retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> getProvider(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                 String accountId,
                                                                                                                                 @Path(value="serviceId")
                                                                                                                                 String serviceId,
                                                                                                                                 @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                 String userId,
                                                                                                                                 @Query(value="redirectUrl")
                                                                                                                                 String redirectUrl)
        Gets the specified Cloud Storage Provider configuration for the User. Retrieves the list of cloud storage providers enabled for the account and the configuration information for the user.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        serviceId - The ID of the service to access. \n\nValid values are the service name (\"Box\") or the numerical serviceId (\"4136\"). (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        redirectUrl - The URL the user is redirected to after the cloud storage provider authenticates the user. Using this will append the redirectUrl to the authenticationUrl.\n\nThe redirectUrl is restricted to URLs in the docusign.com or docusign.net domains.\n (optional)
        Returns:
        Call

      • list

        @GET(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage/{serviceId}/folders/{folderId}")
retrofit2.Call<ExternalFolder> list(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                      String accountId,
                                                                                                                                      @Path(value="folderId")
                                                                                                                                      String folderId,
                                                                                                                                      @Path(value="serviceId")
                                                                                                                                      String serviceId,
                                                                                                                                      @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                      String userId,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="cloud_storage_folder_path")
                                                                                                                                      String cloudStorageFolderPath,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="count")
                                                                                                                                      String count,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                                      String order,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="order_by")
                                                                                                                                      String orderBy,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="search_text")
                                                                                                                                      String searchText,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="start_position")
                                                                                                                                      String startPosition)
        Gets a list of all the items from the specified cloud storage provider. Retrieves a list of all the items in all the folders associated with the user from the specified cloud storage provider. You can limit the scope of the returned items by providing a comma separated list of folder IDs in the request.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        folderId - The ID of the folder being accessed. (required)
        serviceId - The ID of the service to access. \n\nValid values are the service name (\"Box\") or the numerical serviceId (\"4136\"). (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        cloudStorageFolderPath - (optional)
        count - An optional value that sets how many items are included in the response. \n\nThe default setting for this is 25. (optional)
        order - An optional value that sets the direction order used to sort the item list. \n\nValid values are: \n\n* asc = ascending sort order\n* desc = descending sort order (optional)
        orderBy - An optional value that sets the file attribute used to sort the item list. \n\nValid values are: \n\n* modified\n* name (optional)
        searchText - (optional)
        startPosition - Indicates the starting point of the first item included in the response set. It uses a 0-based index. The default setting for this is 0. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call

      • listFolders

        @GET(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage/{serviceId}/folders")
retrofit2.Call<ExternalFolder> listFolders(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                  String accountId,
                                                                                                                                  @Path(value="serviceId")
                                                                                                                                  String serviceId,
                                                                                                                                  @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                  String userId,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="cloud_storage_folder_path")
                                                                                                                                  String cloudStorageFolderPath,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="count")
                                                                                                                                  String count,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                                  String order,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="order_by")
                                                                                                                                  String orderBy,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="search_text")
                                                                                                                                  String searchText,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="start_position")
                                                                                                                                  String startPosition)
        Retrieves a list of all the items in a specified folder from the specified cloud storage provider. Retrieves a list of all the items in a specified folder from the specified cloud storage provider.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        serviceId - The ID of the service to access. \n\nValid values are the service name (\"Box\") or the numerical serviceId (\"4136\"). (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        cloudStorageFolderPath - A comma separated list of folder IDs included in the request. (optional)
        count - An optional value that sets how many items are included in the response. \n\nThe default setting for this is 25. (optional)
        order - An optional value that sets the direction order used to sort the item list. \n\nValid values are: \n\n* asc = ascending sort order\n* desc = descending sort order (optional)
        orderBy - An optional value that sets the file attribute used to sort the item list. \n\nValid values are: \n\n* modified\n* name (optional)
        searchText - (optional)
        startPosition - Indicates the starting point of the first item included in the response set. It uses a 0-based index. The default setting for this is 0. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call

      • listProviders

        @GET(value="v2/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/cloud_storage")
retrofit2.Call<CloudStorageProviders> listProviders(@Path(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                       String accountId,
                                                                                                                       @Path(value="userId")
                                                                                                                       String userId,
                                                                                                                       @Query(value="redirectUrl")
                                                                                                                       String redirectUrl)
        Get the Cloud Storage Provider configuration for the specified user. Retrieves the list of cloud storage providers enabled for the account and the configuration information for the user.\n\nThe {serviceId} parameter can be either the service name or serviceId.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The external account number (int) or account ID Guid. (required)
        userId - The user ID of the user being accessed. Generally this is the user ID of the authenticated user, but if the authenticated user is an Admin on the account, this may be another user the Admin user is accessing. (required)
        redirectUrl - The URL the user is redirected to after the cloud storage provider authenticates the user. Using this will append the redirectUrl to the authenticationUrl.\n\nThe redirectUrl is restricted to URLs in the docusign.com or docusign.net domains.\n (optional)
        Returns:
        Call
